name: Kusava
title: Kusava
desc:
Kusava, Kusava~â™ª
Memories and dreams are full of power.
It is the fruit of flowering plants, and also the seed of new life.
They are the temporary dwelling place of Aranara memories, and they give Aranara strength.

skills.desc:
When Action Phase begins: Discard a maximum of 2 cards with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand. For each card you Discard, this card accumulates 1 Memories and Dreams point (maximum of 2).
When your character uses a Skill: If you haven't played an Action Card this round, consume 1 Memories and Dreams point, and this Skill costs 1 fewer Elemental Die.
